trial_identification.studytitle: Evaluation of forces applied during direct laryngoscopy of medical simulators by operators of differing levels of experience using a modified laryngoscope.
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Evaluation of forces applied during direct laryngoscopy of medical simulators by operators of differing levels of experience using a modified laryngoscope.

conditions.healthcondition: The force applied to the larynx through a laryngoscope during laryngoscopy

conditioncode.conditioncode2: Conditions of unknown or disputed aetiology (such as chronic fatigue syndrome/myalgic encephalomyelitis)

interventions.interventions: Forces applied during laryngoscopy will be measured by a modified laryngoscope designed by one of the investigators- not commercially available. Participants will perform laryngoscopy on the simulator centre manikins under standard conditions and under different degrees of difficulty, (tongue swelling, tongue swelling with cervical stabilization). 3 laryngoscopies will occur for each setting. The force will be measured for each. Participants will have varying experience of intubation.

primaryOutcome.outcome: To evaluate variability in force of laryngoscopy : 1. between operators under standard conditions and difficult conditions.
To evaluate variability in force of laryngoscopy : 2. for the same operator for repeated measurements.
To evaluate variability in force of laryngoscopy : 3. for the same operator under varying degrees of difficulty.
To evaluate variability in force of laryngoscopy : 4. between operators of differing experience.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: Medical students, Medical staff intubating less than 25 times a year, Non-anaesthetists who intubate 50 times or more a year, Anaesthetic trainees with less than 3 years experience, Qualified anaesthetists.

contact.name: Dr. Mary Pinder
contact.address: Centre for Anaesthesia Skills and Medical Simulation (CASMS) Clinical Training and Education Centre (CTEC) University of Western Australia Mail Point M306 35 Stirling Highway Crawley WA 6009
